import Link from "next/link"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const navFontSize = { fontSize: "18px", }; const Navbar = (props) => { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { let lStorage = window.localStorage.getItem("cp-a"); lStorage = JSON.parse(lStorage); if (lStorage !== null || lStorage !== undefined) { setIsLoggedIn(true); } }, []); return (

{props.headerTitle ? ( props.headerTitle ) : ( <> )}

{isLoggedIn ? ( <>
Market (current) Jobs Partnership Forum Blog
  • Members
    Individual Organization
  • James Asafuah
    View Profile Account Settings Logout
{/*
  • Login (current)

*/} ) : ( "" )}
); }; export default Navbar;
